roles: Backend focuses on Python, Django, and AWS
Frontend focuses on React, TypeScript, and Next.js
Full Stack involves both backend and frontend technologies

requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
Backend: Experience with Python and web frameworks
Frontend: Experience with React and modern JavaScript
Full Stack: Experience with both backend and frontend technologies
Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance

faq.job_title: The position is for a Software Engineer, specializing in either Backend, Frontend, or Full Stack development.
faq.position: The position is for a Software Engineer, specializing in either Backend, Frontend, or Full Stack development.
faq.salary: The salary range for this position is $80,000-$100,000 per year, depending on experience and qualifications.
faq.benefits: We offer comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance, a 401(k) with 4% match, unlimited PTO (minimum 3 weeks encouraged), a home office stipend, professional development budget, and catered lunches on in-office days.
faq.remote: This is a hybrid position requiring 2 days in the office per week at our San Francisco headquarters.
faq.tech_stack: For backend: Python, Django, Flask, PostgreSQL, and AWS. For frontend: React, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks.
faq.company: TechInnovate Solutions is a Series B startup with 120 employees. We're building AI-powered workflow automation tools for businesses.
faq.culture: We value innovation, collaboration, and user-centric design. We have a diverse and inclusive workplace with a focus on work-life balance.
faq.interview_process: The interview process includes this initial screening, followed by a technical assessment, and then a final round with the team and hiring manager.
faq.start_date: We're looking for someone who can start within the next 4-6 weeks, but we're flexible for the right candidate.
